name: Planetary Defender (itch) (DrakenNinja)
description:
Oh no! A colored alien invasion is coming for your planet! It is your task to defend the planet you call home by pressing the right buttons on your keyboard (or controller) corresponding  with the colors of the UFO's.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Up arrow key: Blue UFO
  • Down arrow key: Yellow UFO
  • left arrow key: Green UFO
  • right arrow key: Red UFO
  • Z: Activates Slomo

Controller (X-input):

  • A-button: Yellow UFO
  • B-button: Red UFO
  • X-button: Green UFO
  • Y-button: Blue UFO
  • LB: Activates Slomo
